column5: I will put this on the classifieds soon, but i dont know where to start for price for this rod. Does anyone have an idea for price?  its a 2 pc, mint mint condition, barely used with hard case.  St Croix Imperial IF 9678   9'6 7/8 wt   thanks much
Anders, Why sell it? Sounds like the perfect steelhead nymphing rod.  Also, some of the St.Corix rods can be traded for more upscale models.
i have absolulty no interest in fly fishing anymore.  tried long time ago, didnt sit well with me, rather huck a spinner or go downrigging
$10!! I'll save you the bother of reposting it in the classifieds and take it off your hands right now.
I have a 2/3 wt Imperial that I bought used for $ 90, which was on the low side of market value, so I would say at least $ 160 for a 7/8.
I think you should rub the green/white spoon all over it to increase its value
I have this same rod in an 8wt, I can't remember what I paid for it, but it is one of my favorite rods for steelies.
now posted in Classifieds.  thanks guys
